title: Rubber & Tea plantation with beautiful surroundings
details:
This large mixed crop estate offers primarily 6 acres of rubber, tea trees & coconut palms.property is tucked away in a small village surrounded by beautiful views of rubber plantation and paddy fields, far from noise and chaos of the main road.This plot is already connected to mainline water and electricity.also, it has a good access road condition. the property is a 20-minute drive from the town of Galle.the place is idle for villa development.The property is in between two main tourist area of galle and unawatuna,also the beautiful sandy beaches of Hikkaduwa and unawatuna.
0777159905
